name: COVID19LOINCValueSetForSARSCoronavirus2NextGenerationSequencingQualitativeResultsAllSources
title: COVID19 LOINC Value Set for SARS Coronavirus 2 (Next Generation Sequencing) Qualitative Results, All Sources
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to detection of nucleic acids from SARS coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) in various specimens by next generation sequencing.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes detection of SARS-CoV-2 in various specimens by next generation sequencing (NGS), with results provided on a qualitative scale.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes other methods of detecting SARS-CoV-2 (e.g., immunoassay, PCR).)
